value.0:
Herbology

Lore Based Skill (DC Varies Per Recipe)

- To Brew Elixirs from Herbs Found in Nature
- Set up a Campfire then click on it. You can set up the Cook Pot to Brew your Elixirs.
- To Find Herbs you have to Prospect for them. When you think you have spotted an Herb, Open the ORM and choose the Prospecting option. If you have enough Lore Skill you will indentify all Herbs within 5 Meters.

NOTE: The Campfire Pot will stay locked for 10 Seconds.

The Herbs:
- Mountainous
Ginseng - Used to make tea.
Archangel - Ground and mixed with oils to help wounds.
Pennyroyal - Purifies the blood. Internally digested.

- Prairie
Valerian - The root's many uses strengthens one's body.
Suma - A common grass that helps endurance.
Henbane - Cleanses the body. Internally digested.
Cohosh - Cleanses the spirit. Internally digested.  

- Forest
Wormwood - Small shade flower
Wintergreen - Small green plant abundant in forests. Mint.
Eyebright - Abundant in Forests.
Digitalis - Grows freely in wooded areas.
Milfoil - Ground and boiled to help reduce bleeding. Internal.
Wild Indigo - Ground and mixed with oils to help wounds.
Tansy - Ground and mixed with oils to help wounds.

- Rocky (Hot Regions)
Cereus - A sweet scented cactus.

- Desert
Darkmous - A rare cactus.

- Waters
Sumach - A tall shrub cultivated for it's leaves and fruit.  (Found Near Streams/Rivers)
Spoonwort - The plant's leaves and roots have a stimulating effect. (Found Near Ponds/Marshes)

- Cliffs and Rock Outcrops
Maidenhair - Used for external healing.
Pinang - Cleanses the mind. Internally digested.


The Recipes:

Bandage

5xWild Indigo
5x Archangel
5x Tansy
5x Maidenhair
